CustomField.description: Used to filter Accounts from the mailing list. Automatically ticked if you create a new Account with Name including Competitor Name (from Competitor object). Clear the check if it isn't.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to filter Accounts from the mailing list. Automatically ticked if you create a new Account with Name including Competitor Name (from Competitor object). Clear the check if it isn't.
CustomField.label: Potential Competitor
